description:
Cotton flannels are easy to love, they are even easier to love when they are made using organic cotton. The Serenity’s rich flannel gets in between you and brisk fall mornings.

  • Soft organic cotton flannel breathes well
  • Back pleat adds easy movement
  • Single chest pocket is just right for a couple cards and your sunnies
  • Dropped hem gives tucking options
  • Relaxed fit layers well
name: Black Diamond Serenity Long Sleeve Flannel Shirt - Women's
